sentence: In early trading on Tuesday, shares of Merck & Co ( MRK ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.9%.
Year to date, Merck & Co registers a 2.3% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ), trading up 0.1%.
Procter & Gamble Company is showing a gain of 7.1% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are McDonald's Corp ( MCD ), trading up 0.2%, and Caterpillar ( CAT ), trading up 1.9% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
